an11.4:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an11.4:1.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an11.4:2.2: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ,
an11.4:2.3: pāmojje asati pāmojjavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti pīti,
an11.4:2.4: pītiyā asati pītivipannassa hatūpanisā hoti passaddhi,
an11.4:2.5: passaddhiyā asati passaddhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti sukhaṁ,
an11.4:2.6: sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi,
an11.4:2.7: sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ,
an11.4:2.8: yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpanisā hoti nibbidā,
an11.4:2.9: nibbidāya asati nibbidāvipannassa hatūpaniso hoti virāgo,
an11.4:2.10: virāge asati virāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an11.4:3.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsavipanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṁ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi na pāripūriṁ gacchati.
an11.4:3.2: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.4:3.3: avippaṭisāre asati avippaṭisāravipannassa hatūpanisaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ …pe…
an11.4:4.1: Sīlavato, āvuso, sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.4:4.2: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ,
an11.4:4.3: pāmojje sati pāmojjasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti pīti,
an11.4:4.4: pītiyā sati pītisampannassa upanisasampannā hoti passaddhi,
an11.4:4.5: passaddhiyā sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti sukhaṁ,
an11.4:4.6: sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi,
an11.4:4.7: sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ,
an11.4:4.8: yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampannā hoti nibbidā,
an11.4:4.9: nibbidāya sati nibbidāsampannassa upanisasampanno hoti virāgo,
an11.4:4.10: virāge sati virāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ.
an11.4:5.1: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, rukkho sākhāpalāsasampanno. Tassa papaṭikāpi pāripūriṁ gacchati, tacopi … pheggupi … sāropi pāripūriṁ gacchati.
an11.4:5.2: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, sīlavato sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippaṭisāro,
an11.4:5.3: avippaṭisāre sati avippaṭisārasampannassa upanisasampannaṁ hoti pāmojjaṁ …pe…
